export var questionObj = {
  "Qtext": "

Suppose in the given figure, we have \(NO \parallel LM \). It is given that 
\[
	KN = 3 cm
\]
\[
	LN = 1 cm
\]
\[
	LM = 4 cm
\]
Now, write down the values of
\[
	\frac{KO }{OM }
\]
and
\[
	NO 
\]
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline

",
  "Steps": [{
    "id": "s1",
    "n_params": 0,
    "step_txt": " Since the line segment NO is parallel to side LM , we can write 
\[
	\frac{KO }{OM } = \frac{KN }{NL } = \frac{3 }{1 } = 3.0
\]
Now, in the triangles KNO and KLM we have 
\[
	\angle N = \angle L 
\]
and 
\[
	\angle O = \angle M 
\]
So, we have
\[
	\Delta KNO \sim \Delta KLM 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{NO }{LM } = \frac{KN }{KL }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{NO }{4 } = \frac{3 }{3 + 1 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow NO = 3.0 cm
\]
\newline"
  }]
};
export var resp = [{
  "data": [],
  "text": " "
}];

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "

Suppose in the given figure, we have \(NO \parallel LM \). It is given that 
\[
	KN = 3 cm
\]
\[
	LN = 1 cm
\]
\[
	LM = 4 cm
\]
Now, write down the values of
\[
	\frac{KO }{OM }
\]
and
\[
	NO 
\]
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": " Since the line segment NO is parallel to side LM , we can write 
\[
	\frac{KO }{OM } = \frac{KN }{NL } = \frac{3 }{1 } = 3.0
\]
Now, in the triangles KNO and KLM we have 
\[
	\angle N = \angle L 
\]
and 
\[
	\angle O = \angle M 
\]
So, we have
\[
	\Delta KNO \sim \Delta KLM 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{NO }{LM } = \frac{KN }{KL }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{NO }{4 } = \frac{3 }{3 + 1 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow NO = 3.0 cm
\]
\newline"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}]
